sentences.en: Article 14 Diplomatic visas and courtesy visas are issued gratis.
sentences.cn: 第14条外交签证及礼遇签证,免收费用.

sentences.en: But don't take our word for it, qube is available gratis - grab it and see for yourself!
sentences.cn: 但不采取我们的话, qube是提供免费 - 抓斗,它看你自己!

sentences.en: David gives the first consultation gratis.
sentences.cn: 戴维免费提供初次咨询。

sentences.en: Free programs are sometimes distributed gratis, and sometimes for a substantial price.
sentences.cn: 自由的程序有时被免费的发布, 而有时需要收取一定的费用.

sentences.en: He gave me two Cup Final tickets free , gratis and for nothing.
sentences.cn: 他免费给了我两张锦标决赛的票子.

sentences.en: I knew his help wouldn't be given gratis.
sentences.cn: 我知道他的帮助不会是无偿的。

sentences.en: No wonder it is like a gratis supper.
Unless noted otherwise, these publications are gratis.
sentences.cn: 除非特别注明, 这些出版品都是免费.

sentences.en: We get into the exhibition gratis.
We will also arrange for sightseeing in Si'an and the neighbouring area gratis.
sentences.cn: 我们还要组织与会者在 西安 和邻近地区免费游览.

sentences.en: What I did for you was free, gratis, you understand?
sentences.cn: 我为你所做的一切都是免费的，无偿的，你明白吗？

sentences.en: You can get the sample gratis.

words.tran_cn: 无理由的，无端的；免费的

trans.tran_cn: 不付款地，免费地，白，无偿，不取分文
trans.tran_en: If something is done or provided gratis, it does not have to be paid for
